note.p: American newspaper compositor, naturalist and amateur author. Lived in Buffalo, New York State, 1870; Hamburg, New York State, 1915.
letter to G. F. Kittredge, 24 August [1870]
New York, Death Index, 1852–1956 (Ancestry.com, accessed 19 May 2020)
New York State Census 1915 (Hamburg, Erie, New York State 2/1/20) (Ancestry.com, accessed 19 May 2020)
United States Federal Census 1870 (Buffalo, Erie, New York State 4/479) (Ancestry.com, accessed 19 May 2020)
